books.description: A Nantucket novelist gets one final summer to watch what happens from the great beyond.

books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.
books.title: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME

books.description: Four famous siblings throw an epic party to celebrate the end of summer. But over the course of 24 hours, their lives will change forever.

books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: Seth Rogen
books.description: A collection of personal essays by the actor, writer, producer, director, entrepreneur and philanthropist. Read by the author and a full cast. 6 hours, 13 minutes unabridged.
books.title: YEARBOOK

books.author: Michael Lewis
books.description: Stories of skeptics who went against the official response of the Trump administration to the outbreak of Covid-19. Read by Adenrele Ojo. 11 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE PREMONITION

books.author: Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.contributor: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The 10th book in the conservative commentator’s Killing series looks at organized crime in the United States during the 20th century. Read by Robert Petkoff. 10 hours, 5 minutes unabridged.
books.title: KILLING THE MOB

books.author: Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: A look at the key players and outcomes of precision bombing during World War II. Read by the author. 5 hours, 14 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BOMBER MAFIA

books.author: Carol Leonnig
books.description: The three-time Pulitzer Prize winner brings to light the secrets, scandals and shortcomings of the Secret Service. Read by Maggi-Meg Reed and the author. 20 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: ZERO FAIL

books.author: Barack Obama
books.description: In the first volume of his presidential memoirs, Barack Obama offers personal reflections on his formative years and pivotal moments through his first term. Read by the author. 29 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A PROMISED LAND

books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species. Read by Derek Perkins. 15 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: SAPIENS

books.author: Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice. Read by the author. 8 hours, 22 minutes unabridged.
books.title: UNTAMED

books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery. Read by Sean Pratt. 16 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: John Green
books.description: A collection of personal essays that review different facets of the human-centered planet. Read by the author. 10 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE ANTHROPOCENE REVIEWED

books.author: Daniel Kahneman, Olivier Sibony and Cass R. Sunstein
books.contributor: by Daniel Kahneman, Olivier Sibony and Cass R. Sunstein
books.description: What might cause variability in judgments that should be identical and potential ways to remedy this. Read by Jonathan Todd Ross. 13 hours, 28 minutes unabridged.
books.title: NOISE

books.author: Isabel Wilkerson
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist reveals a rigid hierarchy in America today. Read by Robin Miles. 14 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: CASTE

books.author: Daniel Kahneman, Olivier Sibony and Cass R. Sunstein
books.contributor: by Daniel Kahneman, Olivier Sibony and Cass R. Sunstein
books.title: NOISE

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The 10th book in the Dog Man series. Can the power of love overcome the darkness and despair created by new villains?
books.title: MOTHERING HEIGHTS

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: Stories within a story come to life as Li'l Petey, Flippy and Molly show baby frogs how to create comics.
books.title: CAT KID COMIC CLUB

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The ninth book in the Dog Man series. After turning in his badge, the canine cop is determined not to just roll over.
books.title: GRIME AND PUNISHMENT

books.author: Ann M. Martin.
books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Gabriela Epstein
books.description: The ninth book in the Baby-sitters Club series. Claudia must choose between spending time with the very artistic Ashley or the Baby-sitters Club.
books.title: CLAUDIA AND THE NEW GIRL

books.author: Hajime Isayama
books.description: No longer recognizable, Eren controls the Titans on their course to destroy the world.
books.title: ATTACK ON TITAN, 33

books.author: FGTeeV.
books.contributor: by FGTeeV. Illustrated by Miguel Díaz Rivas
books.description: When characters from a video game come to life, Duddy, Moomy and the kids must fight their own avatars.
books.title: FGTEEV SAVES THE WORLD!

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The sixth book in the Dog Man series. When he is wrongly sent to the pound, Dog Man’s friends try to prove his innocence.
books.title: BRAWL OF THE WILD

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The seventh book in the Dog Man series. A new villain has a bone to pick with Dog Man while Petey the Cat starts a new life.
books.title: FOR WHOM THE BALL ROLLS

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The eighth book in the Dog Man series. Petey the Cat feels better after getting out of jail but Li’l Petey struggles to find good in the world.
books.title: FETCH-22

books.author: Victoria Jamieson and Omar Mohamed.
books.contributor: by Victoria Jamieson and Omar Mohamed. Illustrated by Victoria Jamieson and Iman Geddy
books.contributor_note: Illustrated by Victoria Jamieson and Iman Geddy
books.description: A portrait of a Somali refugee and his younger nonverbal brother during their time in Dadaab, a refugee camp in Kenya.
books.title: WHEN STARS ARE SCATTERED

books.author: Terri Libenson
books.description: The fifth book in the Emmie & Friends series. Tyler likes nerding out with Emmie but his jock friends give him a hard time about doing so.
books.title: TRULY TYLER

books.author: Kohei Horikoshi
books.description: Will Izuku Midoriya's chance encounter with a superhero change his fate? Most likely!
books.title: MY HERO ACADEMIA, VOL. 1

books.author: Jerry Craft
books.description: Jordan Banks, an artistically inclined seventh grader from Washington Heights, has a tough time navigating an upscale private school where diversity is low and maintaining his neighborhood friendships.
books.title: NEW KID

books.author: Alison Bechdel
books.description: The MacArthur fellow and cartoonist laureate of Vermont explores her relationship with exercise and looks at various fitness fads.
books.title: THE SECRET TO SUPERHUMAN STRENGTH

books.author: Koyoharu Gotouge
books.description:
The Infinity Train becomes a demon spirit that Tanjiro, Zenitsu and Inosuke
must face.
books.title: DEMON SLAYER: KIMETSU NO YAIBA, VOL. 8

books.author: Lee Child and Andrew Child
books.contributor: by Lee Child and Andrew Child
books.description: Jack Reacher intervenes on an ambush in Tennessee and uncovers a conspiracy.
books.title: THE SENTINEL

books.author: Debbie Macomber
books.description: After dealing with loss and setbacks, two sisters take risks on dreams and love.
books.title: A WALK ALONG THE BEACH

books.author: James Patterson and Richard DiLallo
books.contributor: by James Patterson and Richard DiLallo
books.description: A single mom teams up with an N.Y.P.D. detective to solve a case involving misdeeds at a university hospital.
books.title: THE MIDWIFE MURDERS

books.author: Christine Feehan
books.description: The sixth book in the Shadow Riders series. Emmanuelle is pulled toward Valentino and his family’s private war.
books.title: SHADOW STORM

books.author: Brad Thor
books.description: The 19th book in the Scot Harvath series. With a bounty on his head, Harvath makes an alliance with a Norwegian intelligence operative.
books.title: NEAR DARK

books.author: Debbie Macomber
books.description: Two romance stories: "For All My Tomorrows" and "Yours and Mine."
books.title: SEASIDE SPRINGTIME

books.author: Linda Lael Miller
books.description: The second book in the Painted Pony Creek series. A sheriff hopes to reconnect with a high school sweetheart but she has made a rule for herself against dating cops.
books.title: COUNTRY PROUD

books.author: Diana Palmer
books.description: Three western romances: “Colorado Cowboy,” by Diana Palmer, “The Wolf on Her Doorstep," by Kate Pearce and “Rescue: Cowboy Style,” by Rebecca Zanetti.
books.title: LONE WOLF

books.author: William W. Johnstone and J. A. Johnstone
books.contributor: by William W. Johnstone and J. A. Johnstone
books.description: The third book in the Smoke Jensen Novel of the West series. Shortly after marrying Smoke, Sally uses her gun skills to save a local girl.
books.title: OUTLAW COUNTRY

books.author: Lynsay Sands
books.description: The 32nd book in the Argeneau series.
books.title: MEANT TO BE IMMORTAL

books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: Echoes of a violent childhood reverberate for Zane Bigelow when he starts a new kind of family in North Carolina’s Blue Ridge Mountains.
books.title: UNDER CURRENTS

books.author: Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: The telepathic connection between twin 3-year-old girls might prove more helpful at solving a kidnapping case than an F.B.I. search.
books.title: TWO LITTLE GIRLS IN BLUE

books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: The triumphs and losses of one family over the last century are recounted as a symbolic piece of apparel gets handed down through the generations.
books.title: THE WEDDING DRESS

books.author: Clive Cussler and Robin Burcell
books.contributor: by Clive Cussler and Robin Burcell
books.description: The 12th book in the Sam and Remi Fargo Adventure series. A kingpin is released from prison and a final showdown takes place in Greece.
books.title: WRATH OF POSEIDON

books.author: Julia Quinn
books.description: The second book in the Bridgerton series. Kate Sheffield gets in the way of Anthony Bridgerton's intent to marry.
books.title: THE VISCOUNT WHO LOVED ME

books.author: Katherine Applegate.
books.contributor: by Katherine Applegate. Illustrated by Patricia Castelao
books.title: THE ONE AND ONLY IVAN

books.author: Rosanne Parry.
books.contributor: by Rosanne Parry. Illustrated by Mónica Armiño
books.title: A WOLF CALLED WANDER

books.author: Adam Silvera
books.title: THEY BOTH DIE AT THE END

books.author: Holly Jackson
books.title: A GOOD GIRL'S GUIDE TO MURDER
